DOC.brief_summary: To investigate safety efficacy administration Iguratimod ( CRM01T ) 52 week patient rheumatoid arthritis clinical practice
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Safety Efficacy Iguratimod Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Participants rheumatoid arthritis Participants take iguratimod Exclusion criterion Participants register survey previously Pregnant woman woman suspect pregnant Participants serious liver disorder Participants peptic ulcer Participants know hypersensitivity iguratimod excipients
